item.title: {Class Suggestion} The Tormental
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I’m going to treat this like it was going to be added to the game. Let’s see…

NOBLE1:

Passive 1 - if any role from TOS is said during the game then they will be instantly poisoned

Easy to confirm if there was a Tormental in the game.

NOBLE1:

Passive 2 - after day 6 the Magna sword ability will allow you to pick up to 6 people and 3 of them will die. If there is not enough players then the number will go down. {unlimited uses}

You’d just pick 3 people, negating the nerf of the 6 player choosing.

NOBLE1:

Day Ability 1 - Blinding sword - cause two players to go blind for 20 seconds making them miss everything that was said during that time. {4 uses}

That isn’t bad. I suggest that would be the new Assassin buff for Distract.

NOBLE1:

Day Ability 2 - trollbox - (to possibly make people get into a conversation about TOS){unlimited uses}

They would have to be scripted and professional players would instantly realise they were TOS Trollboxed.

NOBLE1:

Night ability 1 - Magna Sword - take out a magma sword and kill a player. The sword is so bright that it blinds all other players visiting that target and yourself. (Making it so they don’t know what happened){unlimited uses}

Problem with this game is you can’t do this because you always get feedback from your role. Ect. if you are Knight

“You watched over #1”
So the Tormental would instantly be confirmed as NK.

NOBLE1:

Night ability 2 - Now you’re thinking - this will grant you a random night Ability that you will have for the rest of the game.{1 use}

That’s really interesting too. Mind if I use “Now you’re thinking” and “Blinding Sword” into some reworks for Current classes/new ones I’ve been thinking of?

(I know this is a trollpost anyways but I had to leave feedback on “Blinding Sword” and “Now You’re Thinking”. I’ve watched Tormental and Magnasword2 for ages now. Probably since half way through 2016.)
